title: USS Morris (1846b)
text:
The fourth USS "Morris" was a <a href="schooner">schooner</a> in the <a href="United%20States%20Navy">United States Navy</a> in <a href="Ship%20commissioning">commission</a> from 1846 to 1848.
U.S. naval forces captured the <a href="Mexico">Mexican</a> schooner "Laura Virginia" in the <a href="Gulf%20of%20Mexico">Gulf of Mexico</a> in October 1846 during the <a href="Mexican-American%20War">Mexican War</a>. She was taken into the U.S. Navy and renamed "Morris".
"Morris" was sold at the end of the Mexican War in 1848.
